item.title: [GRA7][PaaS] - New release
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 27, 17:00 UTC  -  Oct 28, 01:00 UTC

Oct 8, 12:33 UTC

Start time : 27/10/2022 17:00 UTC
End time : 28/10/2022 01:00 UTC

Sep 20, 20:11 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 13/10/2022 17:00 UTC
End time : 14/10/2022 01:00 UTC
Service impact : At one point each project will be reallocated resulting in a short interruption. Integrations and WebHooks may fail during the maintenance, and you may notice increased deployment times
Service improvement : Our partner communicated to OVHcloud that they will be doing an internal maintenance in order to release the latest features, bug fixes, and performance updates.

item.title: [GRA7][Platform.sh] - Maintenance operation
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 19, 19:00 - 20:00 UTC

Oct 18, 06:09 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 19/10/2022 19:00 UTC
End time : 19/10/2022 19:00 UTC
Service improvement : Our partner will perform maintenance in the GRA7 region to release the latest features, bug fixes and performance updates. All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade; however, at one point, a short downtime of the main components (Console, Accounts, API Proxy, Auth) no more than 10 minutes will be experienced.

item.title: [GRA1][Webhosting] - Cluster028 - Filerz985
item.description:
Oct 17, 15:39 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 07/10/2022 07:00 UTC
End Time : 17/10/2022 15:00 UTC
Service impact : Websites slowdown on filerz985
Root cause : The cause of these slowdowns is a hardware defect.
Current status : Resolved

Oct 14, 09:47 UTC
Update - Due to a technical problem faced by our technical teams, we will restart the data consolidation operation.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

Oct 7, 10:22 UTC
Update - Defective equipment has been replaced.
A data consolidation operation is underway with an estimated duration of 7 days.
Performance may be degraded during this period.

Oct 7, 08:46 UTC
Identified - Update : Our teams will carry out the replacement of a hard disk.
Root cause : The cause of these slowdowns is a hardware defect.

Oct 7, 07:50 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 07/10/2022 07:00 UTC
Service impact : Websites slowdown on filerz985
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : GRA1
Scope of impact : All offers on cluster028 hosted on filerz985
Ongoing actions : Our teams are in the process of identifying the source of this disruption and fixing the problem.

item.title: [Global][Domains] - .com/.net
item.description:
Oct 5, 08:27 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 05/10/2022 05:12 UTC
End Time : 05/10/2022 07:45 UTC

Root cause : Network equipment: Our teams isolated the equipment and are currently in contact with our equipment provider to definitely fix it.
Current status : Resolved

Oct 5, 07:54 UTC
Monitoring - Start time : 05/10/2022 05:12 UTC
Service impact : Customers couldn't register, renew, transfer, restore and delete orders on .com and .net domains
Ongoing actions : The situation is back to normal since 05/10/2022 07:45 UTC.
Our teams are currently monitoring the situation.

Oct 5, 07:31 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 05/10/2022 05:12 UTC

Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently working to solve the problem.

item.title: [FR][Web Cloud] - Domains
item.description:
Oct 1, 18:02 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Sep 30, 23:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Sep 22, 11:07 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 30/09/2022 23:00 UTC
End time : 01/10/2022 18:00 UTC
Service impact : Following a migration maintenance by Afnic that will entail all current operations on the .fr, .re, .yt, .pm, .tf and .wf domain names being unavailable. During this time, it will not be possible to:
=> Register or delete a .fr, .re, .yt, .pm, .tf or .wf domain name
=> Make changes to .fr, .re, .yt, .pm, .tf and .wf domain names (transfer, update contacts, update name servers, etc.)
We apologize for the inconvenience
